Topic.Title: Please help me find this one game!!

Posts.EditableText:
I feel like I am losing my dang mind.
I remember this game where it was open world, and at the beginning you had to select your stats with a limited amount of points, depending on your answer you’d play a type of character. There were skills like sailing/piracy, charisma, strength etc. If you were high in charisma and music I think you played as a courtesan.
You would start in a port city I think?
Does anyone know what this was? It was definitely if and played on a browser.
Not sure if this is the right browser, please let me know if elsewhere is more appropriate!
